instructions: Locate three small buttons under your email folders on the left pane in Gmail. There's an icon of a person, of a chat bubble, and of a phone. Click the chat bubble in the middle of the menu. If after clicking it, the conversations immediately disappear, click it once more to bring them back. Just above the menu buttons are your most recent conversations from Google Hangouts. When you click one, the message box will pop up on the right side of Gmail.
